ModMetaData.name: GrimWorld 40,000 - Core Imperialis
ModMetaData.author: Clashgore, Odzmang, BlackMarket420, Tittymcswaggy, Alite, Abomination, Epsilon, Maxim, Shun The Witch, Samael, Con
ModMetaData.description:
This is the core for Imperial Factions within the Grimworld 40,000 mod series.
The core currently adds Corpse Starch Grimworld Medkits Recreation Table in Warhammer style Ammo for all imperial factions Adamantium, Auramite, Ceramite A trader that will automatically stock itself with the things above, along with the things added by Angel of Death and Astra Militarium if you have those installed. Indocrination chamber which allow you to strip pawns unwavering loyalty trait
